item.title: Install PostgreSQL Addon | Stash
item.description: Install PostgreSQL Addon for Stash Stash uses Function-Task model to backup databases. This Function-Task model enables Stash to extend its capability via addons. In order to backup PostgreSQL databases, you have to install PostgreSQL addon (stash-postgres) for Stash. This addon creates necessary Function and Task definitions to backup/restore PostgreSQL database. You can install the addon either as a helm chart or you can create only the YAMLs of the respective resources.

item.title: Uninstall PostgreSQL Addon | Stash
item.description: Uninstall PostgreSQL addon for Stash In order to uninstall PostgreSQL addon, follow the instruction given below.
